Ahhhh.. the good old pickles!

Made with authentic spices

Pickles are a part of any traditional Indian meal. Be it a South Indian banana leaf meal or a Rajasthani Thali. There is no right way to eat pickle, because according to an average Indian it goes well with anything, even with liquor!!
